Posts.Content: sgpmaxx66 wrote:  I got my results back and it was benign!  The pathology report said it was a "fibrosystic change."   It's still hard to believe.  I was really expecting a different result. I go back in six months for another mamogram.  My life has been changed forever after going through this.  But, I know if I am ever diagnosed with breast cancer, there is hope.  Thank you all so much for your giving me that hope.   This is such an amazing website.  The wealth of information is unsurpassed.  The support is awesome.  I don't think I could have gotten through the waiting without the ladies (and men) on this board.   I have "met" so many amazing people by reading your stories.  I will keep all of you in my prayers.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: THANK YOU sgpmaxx66 momo3esb
